com.qtplaf.platform.statistics

Class Average

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.platform.statistics.Average

  • public class Average
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a smoothed average used as a movement descriptor.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
